title: Topic 004 Question 060
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains a resource group named RG1 and a security group named ServerAdmins. RG1 contains 10 virtual machines, a virtual network named VNET1, and a network security group (NSG) named NSG1. ServerAdmins can access the virtual machines by using RDP.
You need to ensure that NSG1 only allows RDP connections to the virtual machines for a maximum of 60 minutes when a member of ServerAdmins requests access.
options: an Azure policy assigned to RG1
a just in time (JIT) VM access policy in Microsoft Defender for Cloud
an Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) Privileged Identity Management (PIM) role assignment
an Azure Bastion host on VNET1
